alert.note: Alert for Steele (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 09 at 4:19PM CST until February 09 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Scattered snow showers are reducing visibility to a half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Steele County. * WHEN...Until 7 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Brief but sudden reductions to visibility could lead to hazardous travel conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
